about_the_game:
Vicky Schmidt is an energetic dork who's always ready to help other people.
Brian Yu is... just Brian -- and we love him because of it! Such a chill dude.

You've probably known them for a long time, but only as avatars for players to control.
And yet... they're their own people too. They're fully fleshed-out characters with their own fears and dreams.
Haven't you ever wondered what they think and feel when they're not just playable characters?

This DLC turns the tables and brings these two beloved characters on as hitchhikers you can pick up during your road trip.
Thanks to their conversations, road events, endings, and deep conversations, you might get to REALLY know them in whole new depths.
Also... this DLC includes a brand new song. Warning: you may love it.

You've played as them, you've related to them, you've even become them... but are you ready to date them?

content_descriptors.notes: Use of mature language in a humorous way.

Brian Yu is... just Brian -- and we love him because of it! Such a chill dude.

You've probably known them for a long time, but only as avatars for players to control.
And yet... they're their own people too. They're fully fleshed-out characters with their own fears and dreams.

This DLC turns the tables and brings these two beloved characters on as hitchhikers you can pick up during your road trip.

short_description: You know Vicky and Brian. You've played as them, you've related to them, you've even become them... but are you ready to date them? Turn the tables with this DLC and really get to know these two.
